scripts.generate-api:infisical: openapi-generator-cli generate -i https://app.infisical.com/api/docs/json -g typescript-axios -o ./src/infisicalapi_client --skip-validate-spec --additional-properties=useSingleRequestParameter=true,withSeparateModelsAndApi=true,apiPackage=server,modelPackage=model --openapi-normalizer REFACTOR_ALLOF_WITH_PROPERTIES_ONLY=true && npm run post-generate-api
scripts.generate-api:infisical-dev: openapi-generator-cli generate -i http://localhost:8080/api/docs/json -g typescript-axios -o ./src/infisicalapi_client --skip-validate-spec --additional-properties=useSingleRequestParameter=true,withSeparateModelsAndApi=true,apiPackage=server,modelPackage=model --openapi-normalizer REFACTOR_ALLOF_WITH_PROPERTIES_ONLY=true && npm run post-generate-api
